Name: Deep Horizon
About the game: Deep Horizon is an underwater platformer that’s both relaxing and annoyingly clever in its puzzles and environments. With smooth controls, 360 degrees of freedom and 24 hand-crafted levels, each challenge is designed to charm and entertain. Tired of saving the world from apocalyptic evil? Then take a short break in our bite-sized platformer-without-platforms. Revisit your ancient passions: collecting coins and getting all the gold stars in all the levels. Feel good. Smile. Deep Horizon only looks all 8-bit and cute, though – underneath the surface are some tough challenges that will make you re-think just how much you can hate a level designer. What are you waiting for? Take plunge! Full gamepad support, fully playable with just a mouse 24 hand-crafted levels, filled with secrets and dastardly traps Enjoy 360 degrees of freedom platforming Crisp retro graphics
